title: Wake up Art Cullagh
content: agh was gripped by shadowfell after his investigation of House of Healing), to investigate the House of Healing. Return to camp to alert Halsin about the situation. Go to the House of Healing and deal with Malus Thorm and his nurses. You can pass a check (Persuasion DC16, Religion DC 14, Investigation DC 14) to suggest the sisters practise on each other. You can also persuade Malus Thorm to commit suicide (Persuasion DC21), if you read the book Surgery and Physiology: A Sharran's Primer in a roo
